imdb.plot outline: Paul is a new YouTuber who lives at home with his mother and aspires to become a News Anchor for a syndicated network. He spends all night creating his channel and uploading his first video about Health Care. The next morning, Paul drives to the mall to purchase a new blazer and is trapped during an outbreak of the zombie apocalypse. While attempting to escape the mall, Paul documents as much footage as he can while unknowingly investigates the origin of Patient Zero.
imdb.title: Patient Zero Chapter 1: The Messenger
akas: Patient Zero Chapter 1: The Messenger (United States)

While attempting to escape the mall, Paul documents as much footage as he can while unknowingly investigates the origin of Patient Zero.::David Adam Ettedgui
